UsageAndUser.title: Welcome to the Individual API demonstrator

transport.title: Social Pricing for Transport
transport.desc: With the Individual API, build a service with rates adapted to your user's status.

canteen.title: Solidarity Pricing for the Cafeteria
canteen.desc: With the Individual API, build a service with rates adapted to your users' resources.

henri.title: Henri, job seeker
henri.desc: Henri buys an annual transport card. He is a job seeker and eligible for the reduced rate. He will connect using FranceConnect.

juliette.title: Juliette, student
juliette.desc: Juliette wishes to purchase a transport card with a monthly subscription. She is a student and eligible for the reduced rate. She will connect WITHOUT using FranceConnect.

camille.title: Camille, MSA Family Quotient of 320
camille.desc: Camille registers her children in the cafeteria, her family quotient (QF) is 320, she is eligible for the 1 euro Cafeterias program. She will connect using FranceConnect.

kevin.title: Kevin, MSA Family Quotient of 750
kevin.desc: Kevin registers his children in the cafeteria, his family quotient (QF) is 750, he is eligible for the solidarity rate.

Souscription.title: Buy my Mobility + transport card from FuturVille

Eligibilite.title: Subscription to the Mobility + Card
Eligibilite.alertTitle: Your information will be transmitted to verify your status
Eligibilite.alertDescription: We will request proof of your situation directly from the authorities in charge. If the information is available, you will not have to provide supporting documents.

Connexion.tagLeft: In case of request for a reduced rate: Subscription in 3 clicks
Connexion.tafRight: In the event of a request for a reduced rate: Average time of 15 days

Choix-connexion.title: Connection in progress on Mobilités +
Choix-connexion.subTitle: Choose an account to log in:

header.homeLinkPropsTitle: Home - Name of entity (ministry, secretariat of state, government)

overlayText.title: The user goes to the FranceConnect website, selects the account of his choice to connect...

Succes-verification.alertInfoTitle: Your job-seeker status has been confirmed
Succes-verification.alertInfoDescription: Pôle emploi has confirmed your registration as a job seeker
Succes-verification.alertSuccessTitle: You're eligible for the reduced rate!
Succes-verification.alertSuccessDescription: Your Mobilités + card will be 50% financed by your local council and will cost you 30 euros/month.

Erreur-verification.alertTitle: Your job-seeker status could not be confirmed
Erreur-verification.alertDesc: Pôle emploi has been unable to confirm your status.
Erreur-verification.checkboxLabel1: I authorize Mobilités + to reapply for my status at a proposed job centre. I will end my subscription once my status has been obtained.
Erreur-verification.checkboxLabel2: I am sending my Pôle Emploi certificate myself, which will be checked by an agent in the coming days.
Erreur-verification.checkboxLabel3: I need my card now, I order a card without a discount.

HighlightSubscription.subContent: *for job seekers, students, pupils and beneficiaries of complementary health insurance.

CardSocialPricing.cardDescription: Find the description of the process, the eligibility criteria and the documents necessary to obtain a reduced rate Pass

header.homeLinkTitle: Home - Name of entity (ministry, secretariat of state, government)
header.footerDesc: This is a demo to illustrate the use of the Particulier API.

End-journey.title: End of journey!
